*

Moon Man

Sep 24, 2010

The image of glistening golden bodies etched permanently in his mind, Montano dashed out of the haunted sex house where he had left Kane and Krood to their own devices. Following in the wake of Merrem, this was to be his only successful escape from there that night, for he would return many times in increasing abasement. He looked up into the night sky to discover a purple moon in sunglasses grinning down at him.
